title: Test that (cd build && ninja) immediately after build is no-op in CI
body_html:
🐛 Bug

If I do a build like python setup.py build_deps develop, and then I say (cd build && ninja), this should NOT run cmake, and it should be no-op. This is not currently true.

Once we fix it, we should add a test for it so it doesn't regress.
body_text:
🐛 Bug
If I do a build like python setup.py build_deps develop, and then I say (cd build && ninja), this should NOT run cmake, and it should be no-op. This is not currently true.
Once we fix it, we should add a test for it so it doesn't regress.
body:
## 🐛 Bug

If I do a build like `python setup.py build_deps develop`, and then I say `(cd build && ninja)`, this should NOT run cmake, and it should be no-op. This is not currently true.

Once we fix it, we should add a test for it so it doesn't regress.
